text: Consider the following C-function in which a[n] and b[m/] are two sorted integer arrays$ and c[n + m] be another integer array, void xyz(int a[], int b [], int c []){ int i,3,k; i=j=k=0; while ((i<n) && (j<m)) if (a[i] < b[j]) c[k++] = a[i++]; else c[k++] = b[j++]; } Which of the following condition(s) hold(s) after the termination of the while loop? iLj<m,k=n+j—landaln—1] <bjlifi=n i.i <n,k=m+1i—landbm —1] < ali]ifj=m A. only (i) B. only (ii) C. either (i) or (i) but not both D. neither (i) nor (ii) gatecse-2006 algorithms identify-function normal
